Title: Relates to civil penalties and fines related to conditions or uses of land
Summary: Provides that a civil penalty arising from a violation related to the condition or use of real property, which is assessed, levied, or results from a prosecution by a municipality, may be applied against the property at which the violation is found.
LawCode: Add Art 7-B ยง150, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to civil penalties and fines related to conditions or uses of land
